titles.title: Directing the Chairman of the Federal Election Commission to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any emails in the possession of the Commission that were transmitted to or from the email account(s) of former Internal Revenue Service Exempt Organizations Division Director Lois Lerner between January 2009 and April 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 6/25/2014--Introduced. Directs the Chairman of the Federal Election Commission (FEC) to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any electronic communications in the possession of the Chairman or the FEC that were transmitted to or from any electronic mail accounts used by Lois Lerner, former Director of the Exempt Organizations Division of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), between January 1, 2009, and April 30, 2011.
